content:
The Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel-General Oleksandr Sirsky, met with a NATO delegation headed by NATO Military Committee Chairman Admiral Robma Bauer.

He is about itwroteon your Facebook page.

In general, the head informed the representatives of the delegation about the situation on the battlefield.

“The main needs of the Defense Forces of Ukraine were discussed. Key priorities are ammunition and air defense, ”he said.

Alexander Sirsky also thanked NATO colleagues for comprehensive and consistent support of Ukraine.

"At the end of the meeting, NATO delegation was honored near the wall of memory of the soldiers who died for Ukraine in the Russo-Ukrainian War," the head of the Ukrainian army added.

As reported by the Armyinform, weapons will be more: the Ministry of DefensetoldAbout the results of negotiations of Ukrainian and Dutch delegations.
title: Ammunition and Air Force: The Commander -in -Chief of the Armed Forces discussed the needs of defense forces with NATO representatives
